code: import deleteButton from"../images/delete-button.svg";import likeButton from"../images/like-button.svg";import{useContext}from"react";import{CurrentUserContext}from"../contexts/CurrentUserContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var currentUser=useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=props.card.owner._id===currentUser._id;var cardDeleteButtonClassName="element__delete-button ".concat(isOwn?"element__delete-button_active":"");var isLiked=props.card.likes.some(function(i){return i._id===currentUser._id;});var cardLikeButtonClassName="element__like-button ".concat(isLiked?"element__like-button_active":"");function handleClick(){props.onCardClick(props);}function handleLikeClick(){props.onCardLike(props);}function handleDeleteClick(){props.onCardDelete(props);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"element",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,onClick:handleDeleteClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:deleteButton,alt:"Logo de bot\xF3n de eliminar"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:handleClick,className:"element__image",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(props.card.link,")")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"element__title",children:props.card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardLikeButtonClassName,onClick:handleLikeClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:likeButton,alt:"Logo de bot\xF3n de me gusta"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"element__likes",children:props.card.likes.length})]})]});}export default Card;
